content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ARM
      operator: non_empty
    - name: ARM
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value: $ta_arm
Core:
  Id: CORE-000156
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error when ARM is populated and ARM is not in TA.ARM
Operations:
  - operator: distinct
    domain: TA
    name: ARM
    id: $ta_arm
Outcome:
  Message: ARM is not in TA.ARM
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0294
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: 1. Name given to an Arm or Treatment Group. 2. If
                  the timing of visits for a trial does not depend on which Arm a
                  subject is in, then Arm should be left blank.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TV

json.Description: Trigger error when ARM is populated and ARM is not in TA.ARM

Citations.Cited_Guidance: 1. Name given to an Arm or Treatment Group. 2. If the timing of visits for a trial does not depend on which Arm a subject is in, then Arm should be left blank.
